verses.verse: ה֥וֹי <WH1945> Woe הַחֹֽקְקִ֖ים <WH2710> unto them that decree חִקְקֵי־ <WH2711> decrees אָ֑וֶן <WH205> unrighteous וּֽמְכַתְּבִ֥ים <WH3789> and that write עָמָ֖ל <WH5999> grievousness כִּתֵּֽבוּ׃ <WH3789> [which] they have prescribed

לְהַטּ֤וֹת <WH5186> To turn aside מִדִּין֙ <WH1779> from judgment דַּלִּ֔ים <WH1800> the needy וְלִגְזֹ֕ל <WH1497> and to take away מִשְׁפַּ֖ט <WH4941> the right עֲנִיֵּ֣י <WH6041> from the poor עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> of my people לִהְי֤וֹת <WH1961> become אַלְמָנוֹת֙ <WH490> that widows שְׁלָלָ֔ם <WH7998> may be their prey וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְתוֹמִ֖ים <WH3490> the fatherless יָבֹֽזּוּ׃ <WH962> and [that] they may rob

וּמַֽה־ <WH4100> now what תַּעֲשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> And what will ye do לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day פְּקֻדָּ֔ה <WH6486> of visitation וּלְשׁוֹאָ֖ה <WH7722> and in the desolation מִמֶּרְחָ֣ק <WH4801> afar תָּב֑וֹא <WH935> [which] shall come עַל־ <WH5921> and מִי֙ <WH4310> will you תָּנ֣וּסוּ <WH5127> flee לְעֶזְרָ֔ה <WH5833> help-ed וְאָ֥נָה <WH575> where תַעַזְב֖וּ <WH5800> leave כְּבוֹדְכֶֽם׃ <WH3519> glorious

בִּלְתִּ֤י <WH1115> Without me they shall כָרַע֙ <WH3766> bow down תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> among אַסִּ֔יר <WH616> under the prisoners וְתַ֥חַת <WH8478> among הֲרוּגִ֖ים <WH2026> under the slain יִפֹּ֑לוּ <WH5307> and they shall fall בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all זֹאת֙ <WH2063> likewise לֹא־ <WH3808> does not שָׁ֣ב <WH7725> is not turned away אַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> For all this his anger וְע֖וֹד <WH5750> is still יָד֥וֹ <WH3027> but his hand נְטוּיָֽה׃ <WH5186> [is] stretched out still ס

ה֥וֹי <WH1945> O אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> Assyrian שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> the rod אַפִּ֑י <WH639> of mine anger וּמַטֶּה־ <WH4294> and the staff ה֥וּא <WH1931> whose בְיָדָ֖ם <WH3027> in their hand זַעְמִֽי׃ <WH2195> is mine indignation

בְּג֤וֹי <WH1471> nation חָנֵף֙ <WH2611> him against an hypocritical אֲשַׁלְּחֶ֔נּוּ <WH7971> I will send וְעַל־ <WH5921> against עַ֥ם <WH5971> and against the people עֶבְרָתִ֖י <WH5678> of my wrath אֲצַוֶּ֑נּוּ <WH6680> will I give him a charge לִשְׁלֹ֤ל <WH7997> to take שָׁלָל֙ <WH7998> the spoil וְלָבֹ֣ז <WH962> and to take בַּ֔ז <WH957> the prey [וּלְשִׂימֹו כ] (וּלְשׂוּמֹ֥ו <WH7760> appoint ק) מִרְמָ֖ס <WH4823> trample כְּחֹ֥מֶר <WH2563> like the mire חוּצֽוֹת׃ <WH2351> of the streets

וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor כֵ֣ן <WH3651> so יְדַמֶּ֔ה <WH1819> Howbeit he meaneth וּלְבָב֖וֹ <WH3824> not so neither doth his heart לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor כֵ֣ן <WH3651> so יַחְשֹׁ֑ב <WH2803> think כִּ֚י <WH3588> rather לְהַשְׁמִ֣יד <WH8045> to destroy בִּלְבָב֔וֹ <WH3824> so but [it is] in his heart וּלְהַכְרִ֥ית <WH3772> and cut off גּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> nations לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor מְעָֽט׃ <WH4592> not a few
כִּ֖י <WH3588> for יֹאמַ֑ר <WH559> For he saith הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> are not שָׂרַ֛י <WH8269> [Are] not my princes יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> altogether מְלָכִֽים׃ <WH4428> king

הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> like כְּכַרְכְּמִ֖ישׁ <WH3751> Carchemish כַּלְנ֑וֹ <WH3641> [Is] not Calno אִם־ <WH518> Or לֹ֤א <WH3808> like כְאַרְפַּד֙ <WH774> Arpad חֲמָ֔ת <WH2574> Hamath אִם־ <WH518> Or לֹ֥א <WH3808> not כְדַמֶּ֖שֶׂק <WH1834> Damascus שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> Samaria

כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> after מָצְאָ֣ה <WH4672> hath found יָדִ֔י <WH3027> As my hand לְמַמְלְכֹ֖ת <WH4467> the kingdoms הָאֱלִ֑יל <WH457> of the idols וּפְסִ֣ילֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6456> and whose graven images מִירֽוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> did excel them of Jerusalem וּמִשֹּׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> and of Samaria

הֲלֹ֗א <WH3808> not כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> not עָשִׂ֛יתִי <WH6213> Shall I not as I have done לְשֹׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8111> unto Samaria וְלֶאֱלִילֶ֑יהָ <WH457> and her idols כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> after that אֶעֱשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> so do לִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem וְלַעֲצַבֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH6091> images ס

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> will be that כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when יְבַצַּ֤ע <WH1214> hath performed אֲדֹנָי֙ <WH136> Wherefore it shall come to pass [that] when the Lord אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַֽעֲשֵׂ֔הוּ <WH4639> his whole work בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> upon mount צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> Zion וּבִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> and on Jerusalem אֶפְקֹ֗ד <WH6485> I will punish עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּרִי־ <WH6529> the fruit גֹ֙דֶל֙ <WH1433> of the stout לְבַ֣ב <WH3824> heart מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria וְעַל־ <WH5921> and תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <WH8597> and the glory ר֥וּם <WH7312> of his high עֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> looks

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָמַ֗ר <WH559> For he saith בְּכֹ֤חַ <WH3581> By the strength יָדִי֙ <WH3027> of my hand עָשִׂ֔יתִי <WH6213> I have done וּבְחָכְמָתִ֖י <WH2451> [it] and by my wisdom כִּ֣י <WH3588> for נְבֻנ֑וֹתִי <WH995> for I am prudent וְאָסִ֣יר ׀ <WH5493> and I have removed גְּבוּלֹ֣ת <WH1367> the bounds עַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> of the people [וַעֲתִידֹתֵיהֶם כ] (וַעֲתוּדֹֽותֵיהֶם֙ <WH6264> treasures ק) שׁוֹשֵׂ֔תִי <WH8154> and have robbed וְאוֹרִ֥יד <WH3381> and I have put down כַּאבִּ֖יר <WH47> man יוֹשְׁבִֽים׃ <WH3427> the inhabitants

וַתִּמְצָ֨א <WH4672> hath found כַקֵּ֤ן ׀ <WH7064> as a nest יָדִי֙ <WH3027> And my hand לְחֵ֣יל <WH2428> the riches הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> of the people וְכֶאֱסֹף֙ <WH622> and as one gathereth בֵּיצִ֣ים <WH1000> eggs עֲזֻב֔וֹת <WH5800> [that are] left כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> all the earth אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אָסָ֑פְתִּי <WH622> have I gathered וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not הָיָה֙ <WH1961> become נֹדֵ֣ד <WH5074> and there was none that moved כָּנָ֔ף <WH3671> the wing וּפֹצֶ֥ה <WH6475> or opened פֶ֖ה <WH6310> the mouth וּמְצַפְצֵֽף׃ <WH6850> or peeped

הֲיִתְפָּאֵר֙ <WH6286> boast הַגַּרְזֶ֔ן <WH1631> Shall the axe עַ֖ל <WH5921> over הַחֹצֵ֣ב <WH2672> itself against him that heweth בּ֑וֹ אִם־ <WH518> lo יִתְגַּדֵּ֤ל <WH1431> magnify הַמַּשּׂוֹר֙ <WH4883> therewith? [or] shall the saw עַל־ <WH5921> over מְנִיפ֔וֹ <WH5130> itself against him that shaketh כְּהָנִ֥יף <WH5130> should shake שֵׁ֙בֶט֙ <WH7626> it? as if the rod וְאֶת־ <WH853> מְרִימָ֔יו <WH7311> [itself] against them that lift it up כְּהָרִ֥ים <WH7311> should lift up מַטֶּ֖ה <WH4294> [or] as if the staff לֹא־ <WH3808> is not עֵֽץ׃ <WH6086> [itself as if it were] no wood

לָ֠כֵן <WH3651> Therefore יְשַׁלַּ֨ח <WH7971> send הָאָד֜וֹן <WH113> Therefore shall the Lord יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> the GOD צְבָא֛וֹת <WH6635> of hosts בְּמִשְׁמַנָּ֖יו <WH4924> among his fat ones רָז֑וֹן <WH7332> leanness וְתַ֧חַת <WH8478> and under כְּבֹד֛וֹ <WH3519> and under his glory יֵקַ֥ד <WH3344> he shall kindle יְקֹ֖ד <WH3350> a burning כִּיק֥וֹד <WH3350> A burning אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> like the burning of a fire

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> will become אֽוֹר־ <WH216> And the light יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel לְאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> shall be for a fire וּקְדוֹשׁ֖וֹ <WH6918> and his Holy One לְלֶהָבָ֑ה <WH3852> for a flame וּבָעֲרָ֗ה <WH1197> and it shall burn וְאָֽכְלָ֛ה <WH398> and devour שִׁית֥וֹ <WH7898> his thorns וּשְׁמִיר֖וֹ <WH8068> and his briers בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> in one

וּכְב֤וֹד <WH3519> the glory יַעְרוֹ֙ <WH3293> of his forest וְכַרְמִלּ֔וֹ <WH3759> and of his fruitful field מִנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> both soul וְעַד־ <WH5704> against בָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> and body יְכַלֶּ֑ה <WH3615> And shall consume וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become כִּמְסֹ֥ס <WH4549> fainteth נֹסֵֽס׃ <WH5264> lift up as an ensign

וּשְׁאָ֥ר <WH7605> And the rest עֵ֛ץ <WH6086> of the trees יַעְר֖וֹ <WH3293> of his forest מִסְפָּ֣ר <WH4557> shall be few יִֽהְי֑וּ <WH1961> become וְנַ֖עַר <WH5288> that a child יִכְתְּבֵֽם׃ <WH3789> may write פ

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will never יוֹסִ֨יף <WH3254> shall no more again ע֜וֹד <WH5750> again שְׁאָ֤ר <WH7605> [that] the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וּפְלֵיטַ֣ת <WH6413> and such as are escaped בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> of the house יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob לְהִשָּׁעֵ֖ן <WH8172> stay עַל־ <WH5921> on מַכֵּ֑הוּ <WH5221> upon him that smote וְנִשְׁעַ֗ן <WH8172> them but shall stay עַל־ <WH5921> on יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> upon the LORD קְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בֶּאֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> in truth
שְׁאָ֥ר <WH7605> The remnant יָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> shall return שְׁאָ֣ר <WH7605> [even] the remnant יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> of Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> about אֵ֖ל <WH410> God גִּבּֽוֹר׃ <WH1368> unto the mighty

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For אִם־ <WH518> though יִהְיֶ֞ה <WH1961> become עַמְּךָ֤ <WH5971> For though thy people יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel כְּח֣וֹל <WH2344> be as the sand הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> of the sea שְׁאָ֖ר <WH7605> [yet] a remnant יָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> of them shall return בּ֑וֹ כִּלָּי֥וֹן <WH3631> the consumption חָר֖וּץ <WH2782> decreed שׁוֹטֵ֥ף <WH7857> shall overflow צְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> with righteousness

כִּ֥י <WH3588> For כָלָ֖ה <WH3617> a consumption וְנֶחֱרָצָ֑ה <WH2782> even determined אֲדֹנָ֤י <WH136> For the Lord יְהוִה֙ <WH3069> GOD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עֹשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> shall make בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> in the midst כָּל־ <WH3605> of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of all the land ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֤י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֙ <WH3068> GOD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֥א <WH3372> be not afraid עַמִּ֛י <WH5971> O my people יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> that dwellest צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> in Zion מֵֽאַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> of the Assyrian בַּשֵּׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> thee with a rod יַכֶּ֔כָּה <WH5221> he shall smite וּמַטֵּ֥הוּ <WH4294> his staff יִשָּֽׂא־ <WH5375> and shall lift up עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> against בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> against thee after the manner מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

כִּי־ <WH3588> for ע֖וֹד <WH5750> while מְעַ֣ט <WH4592> little while מִזְעָ֑ר <WH4213> For yet a very וְכָ֣לָה <WH3615> shall cease זַ֔עַם <WH2195> and the indignation וְאַפִּ֖י <WH639> and mine anger עַל־ <WH5921> to תַּבְלִיתָֽם׃ <WH8399> in their destruction

וְעוֹרֵ֨ר <WH5782> shall stir up עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> against יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts שׁ֔וֹט <WH7752> a scourge כְּמַכַּ֥ת <WH4347> for him according to the slaughter מִדְיָ֖ן <WH4080> of Midian בְּצ֣וּר <WH6697> at the rock עוֹרֵ֑ב <WH6159> of Oreb וּמַטֵּ֙הוּ֙ <WH4294> and [as] his rod עַל־ <WH5921> will be over הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> [was] upon the sea וּנְשָׂא֖וֹ <WH5375> so shall he lift it up בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> after the manner מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יָס֤וּר <WH5493> shall be taken away סֻבֳּלוֹ֙ <WH5448> [that] his burden מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from שִׁכְמֶ֔ךָ <WH7926> from off thy shoulder וְעֻלּ֖וֹ <WH5923> and his yoke מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from צַוָּארֶ֑ךָ <WH6677> from off thy neck וְחֻבַּ֥ל <WH2254> shall be destroyed עֹ֖ל <WH5923> and the yoke מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> because שָֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> of the anointing

בָּ֥א <WH935> He is come עַל־ <WH5921> against עַיַּ֖ת <WH5857> to Aiath עָבַ֣ר <WH5674> he is passed בְּמִגְר֑וֹן <WH4051> to Migron לְמִכְמָ֖שׂ <WH4363> at Michmash יַפְקִ֥יד <WH6485> he hath laid up כֵּלָֽיו׃ <WH3627> his carriages

עָֽבְרוּ֙ <WH5674> They are gone over מַעְבָּרָ֔ה <WH4569> the passage גֶּ֖בַע <WH1387> at Geba מָל֣וֹן <WH4411> they have taken up their lodging לָ֑נוּ חָֽרְדָה֙ <WH2729> is afraid הָֽרָמָ֔ה <WH7414> Ramah גִּבְעַ֥ת <WH1390> Gibeah שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> of Saul נָֽסָה׃ <WH5127> is fled
